about.description:
This is an implementation of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2 in C.

The framing layer of HTTP/2 is implemented as a reusable C library. On top
of that, we have implemented an HTTP/2 client, server and proxy. We have
also developed load test and benchmarking tools for HTTP/2.
about.summary: This is an implementation of Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2.

name: libnghttp2-static
raw_recipe:

package:

source:

    url: https://github.com/nghttp2/nghttp2/releases/download/v1.41.0/nghttp2-1.41.0.tar.gz
build:
    number: 2
    string: hb209c28_2
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 hb79408c_9
        - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.34 hd8a9c84_27
        - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h610be87_16
        - gcc_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h1ce7429_27
        - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h230727a_16
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h7828b9a_27
        - kernel-headers_linux-ppc64le 3.10.0 hbe0c576_10
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h60defe3_9
        - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 hbb93445_16
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 hdd5993f_15
        - libgomp 9.3.0 hdd5993f_15
        - libstdcxx-devel_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h20c6264_16
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h822a55f_15
        - make 4.3 h6eb9509_0
        - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h8b29623_10
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 hdd5993f_15
        - libgomp 9.3.0 hdd5993f_15
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h0eba5ba_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h822a55f_15
    run:
        - c-ares-static
        - libev-static
        - libgcc-ng >=8.4.0
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h0eba5ba_2
        - libstdcxx-ng >=8.4.0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libnghttp2.a
about:
    description: 'This is an implementation of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version
        2 in C.


        The framing layer of HTTP/2 is implemented as a reusable C library. On top

        of that, we have implemented an HTTP/2 client, server and proxy. We have

        also developed load test and benchmarking tools for HTTP/2.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/nghttp2/nghttp2
    doc_url: https://nghttp2.org/documentation/
    home: http://github.com/nghttp2/nghttp2
    license: MIT
    license_family: MIT
    license_file: COPYING
    summary: This is an implementation of Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2.
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - cpaulik
        - mariusvniekerk
        - wolfv

about.description:
This is an implementation of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2 in C.

The framing layer of HTTP/2 is implemented as a reusable C library. On top
of that, we have implemented an HTTP/2 client, server and proxy. We have
also developed load test and benchmarking tools for HTTP/2.
about.summary: This is an implementation of Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2.
